titles: Some reason tenderly offered to the serious consideration of the commissioners, for executing the Poll Act; why such persons should not be rated 20 s. as preachers, or teachers, who do not receive any profits, or salaries for such their preaching or teaching.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Northcott, George-Yard in Lombard-street,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
